## Report

Generate some data, and attach to this report.

```{python}
import polars as pl

df = pl.DataFrame({
    "A": [1, 2, 3],
    "B": ["a", "b", "c"]
})

df.write_csv("data.csv")

df
```

```{python}
from pathlib import Path

Path("foo.txt").write_text("This is a text file.")
```
